title: Euphoria Season 2 Review
description:
Go to http://bit.ly/rt_kindafunny to get Guild Wars 2: End of Dragons!

Greg Miller joins Tim and Kevin to give their thoughts on Euphoria Season 2 starring Zendaya.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
